Nostalgiya
Launched 4 November 2004; 13 years ago (2004-11-04)
Owned by Veriselintel (Russian: Вериселинтел)
Country Russia
Language Russian
Broadcast area  Russia
 Kazakhstan
 Azerbaijan
 Armenia
 Georgia
 Estonia
 Latvia
 Lithuania
 Belarus
 Moldova

 Israel
 United States
Website www.nostalgiatv.ru
Availability
Satellite
Eutelsat 36A/B (36° в.д.) 12341 H, SR 27500, FEC 3/4

Nostalgiya (Russian: Ностальгия) is a Russian television channel, the main goal of which is to bring a feeling of nostalgia for the Soviet Union.[citation needed] Launched in 2004, the channel broadcasts on all European portion of the former Soviet Union as well as some countries of the "Far Abroad" (United States, Germany, Israel).[citation needed]

The logo of the channel stylized with a Soviet logo of hammer and sickle (☭) turned in opposite direction to the right.

One of its main presentations is a talk show "Born in the USSR" (Russian: Рожденные в СССР; Rozhdyonnye v SSSR) which provides a daily interactive discussion with its spectators.
